ProductInfo.Features:
Fits: Sony KDL-55HX850. FRAME ONLY - TV NOT INCLUDED
Quality hardwood frame surrounds the TV with chestnut matting covering the TV border.
Designed for wall mounted televisions. Wall to front of TV must be at least 2 inches for ventilation. Frame does not interfere with remote controls or sound from built-in speakers.
Frame adds 2 3/8 inches to the top, bottom, and each side of the TV. Rigid premium fabric matting exactly covers the border or bezel of the TV.
Simple one-minute installation with no tools or TV un-mounting required. Custom made in Austin, Texas to exactly fit your Sony KDL-55HX850
ProductInfo.Name: TV Frame for the Sony KDL-55HX850
